result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald Scott Collins

defendant.name: Collins, Ronald Scott
defendant.address: W9551 County Highway A, Spooner, WI 54801

records.addlTxt: 11:05 AM Defendant Ronald Scott Collins in court.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Ronald Scott Collins.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for State of Wisconsin. Case on for final pre-trial.  Atty Otten updates the Court: defense is ready to proceed to a jury trial.  Court notes this is the only case set for trial that date and it will proceed as scheduled; inquires of analyst- #1 for analyst.  Court ensures defendant understands this is a drop-dead date and that he understands the offer.  Def understands the offer and formally rejects it; wants jury trial.  ADA Schmidt raises issue- MIL to exclude the analyst.  Atty Otten has not received the lab results (State hasn't received it yet either).  State asks to deviate from the scheduling order as it relates to the lab results; Court will modify the scheduling order to "State must provide the lab results within 48 hours from receipt" as lab results are not available yet.  Court will allow parties to resolve within 48 hours once the lab results are available and parties to motion the court to allow resolution.
Defendant
Scheduling
Scheduling

1:13 PM Defendant Ronald Scott Collins appeared by phone.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Ronald Scott Collins.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for State of Wisconsin.  Case on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: no resolution has been reached, def wants trial.  Discussion of lab analyst/case numbers.  DA's office directed to get the information needed from St Croix Tribal to schedule with the analyst.  Bond continues.
Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Final pre-trial on October 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Jury trial - 12 person on December 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

10:19 AM Defendant Ronald Scott Collins in court.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Ronald Scott Collins.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case on for Status Conference. Defense attorney updates the Court: missing piece of discovery no longer exists, needs time to research issue, requests additional status conference.  Court to set 1 more status conference.
Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on September 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

11:36 AM Prosecuting attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ronald Scott Collins in court.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Ronald Scott Collins. Case on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: missing video from discovery; issue needs to be resolved prior to entering into a plea agreement.
Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on September 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on August 11, 2022 at 11:30 am.

10:24 AM Defendant, Ronald Scott Collins, appeared with Attorney Alysja Otten.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt appeared for the State.  Case on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: needs to discuss offer further w/ def.  Offer is currently- plead to amphetamine as misdemeanor for 1 year probation.  Status conference scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on May 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.

01:30 PM Defendant, Ronald Scott Collins, appeared with Attorney Alysja Otten.  Attorney James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State.  Def appears telephonically with court approval.  Case on for Arraignment.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of information, def. waives reading.  Court informs def. of charges, possible penalties and rights.  NG plea entered to all counts.  Atty Otten preserves on motions until next date.  Status conference scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.

04:01 PM Defendant, Ronald Scott Collins, appeared with Attorney Alysja Otten.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt appeared for the State.  Def appears by phone with court's approval.  Waiver of Preliminary Hearing:  Court informs def of rights to PH; waived by def.  Court finds waiver of right to PH knowingly, freely, voluntarily made.  Court finds factual basis for bind over.  State files information.  Arraignment scheduled for April 6, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on March 28, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

01:36 PM Defendant, Ronald Scott Collins, appeared with Attorney Alysja Otten appearing specially.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt appeared for the State.  Case on for an Initial Appearance.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights.  WTLPH.  Prior to leaving the courthouse, the defendant shall report to the sheriff's dept. to provide fingerprints.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 28, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
